name: haxe-crypto
description: Hurlant crypto library ported to haxe: tls, md2, md5, sha1, sha224, sha256, xtea, hex, base64, hmac, tlsprf, blowfish, des, tripledes, aes, cfb8, cfb, ctr, ofb, ecb, bigint, big integers, rsa, pem
releasenote: Partial implementation (no tls support yet) (partial rsa) (partial pem support)
